  • Field Details

    • DRAWING_WIDTH

      public static final int DRAWING_WIDTH
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DRAWING_HEIGHT

      public static final int DRAWING_HEIGHT
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • mazeSelected

      public int mazeSelected
      mazeSelected is the index of allMazes that will be loaded on screen

    • mazeChangeCooldown

      public int mazeChangeCooldown
      mazeChangeCooldown is the number of draw() method calls that pass between each maze change. So at mazeChangeCooldown = 30, you can change the maze at most once per 30 frames or once per 0.5 seconds

    • abilityNum

      public int abilityNum
      how many abilities are to be spawned randomly in the maze
